features: Battery Operated Desk Lamp: Equipped with built-in battery, no need to plug in when using, cordless and portable to take to anywhere freely, especially there is limited outlets and power outage happens( Please notice that the lamp should be charged to protect the battery's lifespan if long time no use)

Dimmable Touch Control Table Lamp: Touch sensitive control with 3-level brightness adjustable, best for reading, working, studying, crafting, displaying, camping or emergency use, suitable for college dorm, office, bedroom, living room, kids room, bathroom, etc

Flexible and Foldable Study Lamp: with 360°flexibility, the gooseneck lamp allows you to light up where you needed. It also can be folded into a small lamp so that it don’t take up too much space when travel

Rechargeable desk lamp with USB port: Equipped with universal USB charging cable, so that you can charge this small desk lamp with USB adapter, power bank, desktop, laptop while lighting it up, saving time to wait

Eye-caring and Energy Saving LED Light: 5 W bright led glow, 400 lumens at full brightness, no flicker, no dark area, protect your eyes from fatigue. 12 months warranty is provided for this portable lamp, and if you have any issue with it, pls email us to solve

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEEPLITE LED Small Desk Lamp with Flexible Gooseneck 3 Level Brightness, Battery Operated Table Lamp 5W Touch Control, Compact Portable lamp for Dorm Study Office Bedroom, Eye-Caring and Energy Saving,Desk Light for Kids, Rechargeable Adjustable Gooseneck Reading Lamp.

Desk Lamp with Touch Sensitive 3 Brightness Adjustable for You Different Needs. DEEPLITE Battery Operated Desk Lamp is a built-in battery,and touch sensitive control with 3-level brightness adjustable, best for reading, working, studying, crafting, displaying, camping or emergency use, suitable for college dorm, office, bedroom, living room, kids room, bathroom, etc

Flexible and Foldable Study Lamps for Bedrooms, Dorm,Desktop Computer The small desk lamp with 360°flexibility, the gooseneck lamp allows you to light up your light pointed in any direction. It also can be folded into a small lamp so that it don’t take up too much space when travel, a suitable study desk lamp for kids/women/men's crowded desks.

Eye-caring and Energy Saving LED Reading Light The bright desk lamp with 5 W bright led glow, 400 lumens at full brightness, rechargeable and energy saving led glow, no flicker, no dark area, protect your eyes from fatigue. a great accompany for reading, working, painting, crafting, sewing, or displaying an exhibition.

Battery Operated Portable Computer LED Lamp for Desk The USB rechargeable desk lamp is cordless portable design to take to anywhere freely, especially limited outlets and power outage happens,and last for 4-8 hours after fully charged (Brightness Duration: High 4-5 H, Mid 6-7 H, Low 7-8 H ),and can be used when charging by the computer or wall plug.

Widely Used for Reading, Working, Studying, Crafting, Displaying, Camping Note: 12 months is provided for this portable lamp,Please charge this lamp in time when it become dim, and pls recharge it to protect the battery's life if you do not use it often. and if there is any thing with the lamp,pls let us know.

Specifications of the small Desk Lamp Power: 5 W; Input: DC 5V 1.5A; Battery Capacity: 1800 mAh ; Cable Length: 1 m / 3.3 ft ; Light Source: 18 LED Lamp Beads ; Color temperature: 6000-6500 K; Type: Touch Control 3-Level Brightness; Dimension: 4.7*3.5*14.9 inches,142 g ; Material: ABS Plastic ; Package : 1* Lamp, 1* USB Cable, 1* Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very compact so it doesn’t take much desk space & it’s versatile. I love that the neck is flexible & it has 3 light settings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A marvelous invention. It’s rechargeable it’s light or not so bright when wanted that way. It was inexpensive and lightweight. Changed my life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light but very effective
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect lamp for my bedroom. I don't have a large bedroom, so I purchased a very small nightstand to go next to my bed. This is a perfect fit for the nightstand. I love its functionality, the way it can be swiveled to fit the angle I need, and that it is a touch lamp, so I don't have to fish around for a switch to turn the lamp on when it's dark.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comes in handy
reviews.reviewText: It is rechargeable which is great because i dont have an outlet for everything i want to use and can put it wherever it is convenient.it is very lightweight so it falls over easy,but it can be twisted in a way that it sits without falling.you also get three different brightness levels.it isba handy item to have.i like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and light weight
reviews.reviewText: This little light is powerful. The neck bends very well. I use it to help give extra light when I craft. It’s perfect and small.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for. Very bright lightweight desk light. Works standalone and also while plugged in to charge. Included cable is USB-A on one end to plug in to your laptop or other port to charge it, and the other end is a DC barrel plug connector that plugs into the lamp. Tiny red LED on base shows it’s charging and turns blue when fully charged.The only thing that takes some getting used to is how easily it turns on. Just a slight brush of your hand by the switch turns it on.Overall though I’m quite happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars NOT BATTERY POWERED
reviews.reviewText: This item is listed all over the place as being "BATTERY POWERED" so when it came I didn't even think to look for a charging cord in the box. I used it all of one time to paint my nails, and by the second time it was noticeably dimmer and getting dimmer by the minute. I turned it over to see how I replaced the batteries, and that's when I saw the charging port. And of course it's not a universal charging type, like micro-USB. It's a special kind of plug that must've come with the light. But by this point the packaging was long thrown away. I clicked the customer service options for "Part was missing item" in the hopes that they could just send me a charger. But then I was transferred to a different customer service portal, and that option was no longer available, I could only choose "Item arrived damaged or defective." So my only option now is to get a replacement one. This should be listed as RECHARGEABLE LIGHT or LIGHT WITH CHARGER. IT IS NOT BATTERY POWERED!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mighty Little Lamp
reviews.reviewText: This little lamp is mighty!! It is bright enough to work on crafts and puzzles. It is small enough to tuck into a drawer when not in use. Very versatile! Designed nicely with sleek profile, easy touch on and off, with three levels of brightness.

The 2 pack was a great deal! Came with cable and the lamp is lightweight and easy to move locations as needed! Even better, its charging last a long time and the levels of brightness I need are wonderful! Love my free and easy lamps!

reviews.reviewTitle: Adecuada para una mesita de noche
reviews.reviewText: Es perfecta en tamaño y luminosidad para una mesita de noche.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this lamp in black to brighten my desk while crafting in the winter months and so far I'm really pleased with it.It arrives in a little box, with a cable for charging. Once out of the box, the base seems very sturdy and the neck of the lamp is easy to position to redirect the light. The whole lamp is very lightweight and compact, while the touch button on the base is very sensitive and works well too. With three levels of brightness it is easy to adjust by tapping the button, which is a nice option to have for the price.For it's size, it throws out a good amount of light for working under, even for small detailed projects and feels easy on the eyes.Really like that it is rechargeable via USB and the charge seems to last fairly well, which makes it easy to move from room to room easily without cables (and useful in a power cut!)Overall, great value for money and works really well. Would recommend this lamp!
Bella linea, leggera e facile da usare (ricarica, 3 livelli di luminosità), facile da riporre (si piega senza problemi). L’ho presa per la scrivania di mio figlio, ma la puoi portare e usare ovunque.
